New Records: Adam Zampa became just the third Australian spinner to take four wickets in a World Cup clash, following Shane Warne (four times) and Brad Hogg (twice)
Key Match Events: Australia won the match by 5 wickets
Mitch Marsh was run out for 52
Marnus Labuschagne and Josh Inglis steadied the ship
Glenn Maxwell hit a spectacular display of batting
Marcus Stoinis hit the winning runs with a massive six over long on
Pre-Game Insights: There are still plenty of matches to go in the tournament
The Aussies take on Pakistan in their next World Cup clash
Post-Match Reflections: Adam Zampa said he took his four wickets against Sri Lanka while battling back spasms
Zampa said he was feeling 'not great' against Sri Lanka, but rallied to become man of the match
Zampa suggested he might have made the decision to take himself off for Glenn Maxwell anyway due to his back
Miscellaneous Highlights: Australia's win has lifted them to eighth on the ladder
The win lofts the Aussies off the bottom of the table
Pat Cummins made the call to take Adam Zampa off for Glenn Maxwell
